name: Emerald Ring (CotCE)
description:
First game on itch.io, came from a one off thought and an opportunity that I would never have in the future so I took it. I think you'll see the point in the game after you play it a little. 

Pizza Jam 2019 entry. Storyline name: Charm of the Chaos Emeralds
